page.description: use WMI to find out what resources are being used by the specified process

prototypes.prototype: Property_List as P = a5_resource_info([* process_name_or_id [,C computer ]])
Property_List as P = a5_resource_info( process_name_or_id as N )

argument.name: Property_List
argument.description: A dot variable containing information about the process.

argument.name: process_name_or_id
argument.description: A character string or variable that contains the name of a running executable (i.e. "alpha5.exe") or a numeric variable that is the process ID of a running executable (i.e. 593).

page.discussion: The A5_RESOURCE_INFO() function returns Windows resource utilization info for the specified process name or ID. If the specified Process_Name_or_ID does not match the name or ID of an executable currently being run by Windows, nothing is returned.
